name: I Was Hacked!
description:
SUBMITTING SCORES ONLY WORKS ON THIS VERSION:https://www.scirra.com/arcade/action-games/i-was-hacked-38695

"I Was Hacked" is an arcade style bullet hell game where you start shooting uncontrollably. The bullets bounce off the walls and come zooming back towards you! Luckily, you can teleport anywhere you want at any time! I hope you enjoy trying to get the top score! Comment yours below!
